remarks: Zero property that will be used for inner product.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapip0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapip0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapip0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapip0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmapip0.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapip0.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` R ) $.
hdmapip0.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapip0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapip0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmapip0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( S ` X ) ` X ) = Z <-> X = .0. ) ) $.
